Calling him D-13 is fine.  You may not refer to him as Devil Gigatron because 
LN did have that character in the past.  It was during the time when there 
was no updating.  That is why it is not on the site.  If you do not wish to 
call him D-13 then you may change his name at anytime.

--part1_168.851ee5f.2991d4bc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
